name: Restfull-apis
tagline: Communication APIs for Bulk SMS, Two-Factor Authentication, and Number Lookup
body:
# Communication Platform APIs

[Cequens](http://www.cequens.com) is a global Communication Platform as a Service (CPaaS) company that offers developers APIs for messaging, video, and voice services for Bulk SMS, two-factor authentication, and number lookup.

For API references and examples, visit [api.cequens.com/docs](http://api.cequens.com/docs)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
